data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Ville de N'Djamena that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ville de N‘Djamena, Chad
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,092,100 people living in Ville de N'Djamena.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Ville de N‘Djamena, Chad.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 79,491 believers in Ville de N'Djamena.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Bakha people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, please give the 79,491 believers in the state of Ville de N'Djamena the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Ville de N'Djamena. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.section_summary:
the state of Ville de N‘Djamena, Chad has a population of 1,092,100.

We estimate Ville de N'Djamena has 79,491 people who might know Jesus, 199,398 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 813,211 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 199,398 people in the state of Ville de N'Djamena who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness
